meanings.sent1: The toy car was undeformed and looked brand new.
meanings.sent2: The undeformed cake was perfectly round and untouched.
meanings.sent3: The undeformed balloon refused to pop no matter how hard I squeezed it.
meanings.sent4: Her undeformed smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The undeformed flower stood tall and proud in the garden.

meanings.definition: Remaining in its original shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The undeformed clay sculpture was a masterpiece of art.
meanings.sent2: The undeformed building stood strong against the storm.
meanings.sent3: The undeformed cookie magically stayed whole despite being dropped.
meanings.sent4: His undeformed handwriting was neat and easy to read.
meanings.sent5: The undeformed mountain peak glistened in the sunlight.
